text: Manase bɔnsɔnna sofana ndee yi fa Dawuda fɛma, e nun Filisitine yi sigama Sɔli yɛngɛdeni waxatin naxan yi. Koni, Dawuda nun a muxune mi fa Filisitine mali yɛngɛsodeni na waxatini bayo Filisiti kuntigine e raxɛtɛ nɛn, e yi a fala, e naxa, “Xa Dawuda mɔn kafu a kari fonna Sɔli ma, en birin faxama nɛn.”
